Package io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.plan

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Op
    This is a vertex on the logical Graph, representing user defined functions in Stream DSL.
    OpEdge
    This is an edge on the logical plan.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataSinkOp
    This represents a DataSink and creates a DataSinkTask.
    DataSourceOp
    This represents a DataSource and creates a DataSourceTask
    Direct
    The upstream OP and downstream OP doesn't require network data shuffle.
    GroupByOp<IN,GROUP>
    This represents an operation with groupBy followed by window aggregation.
    MergeOp
    This represents an operation with merge followed by window aggregation.
    Planner
    This class is responsible for turning the high level Stream DSL into low level Processor API.
    ProcessorOp<T extends Task>
    This represents a low level Processor.
    Shuffle
    The upstream OP and downstream OP DOES require network data shuffle.
    TransformOp<IN,OUT>
    This represents operations that can be chained together (e.g.
    TransformWindowTransformOp<IN,MIDDLE,OUT>
    This is an intermediate operation, produced by chaining TransformOp and WindowTransformOp.
    WindowOp
    This represents a window aggregation, together with a following TransformOp
    WindowTransformOp<IN,OUT>
    This is an intermediate operation, produced by chaining WindowOp and TransformOp.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OpChainException
    Runtime exception thrown on chaining.
